participant_1.background:
I am of mixed race and enjoy exploring the city with my best friend.
I'm proud of my collection of ancient weapons from different cultures.
i am well built and tall.
i would like to be a teacher in the future.
I'm not into fortune tellers, but I'm really interested in my family history.

participant_2.background:
I spend my weekends reading fantasy novels and watching Game of Thrones.
I'm still living with my parents while I save up for my own place.
I want to learn how to train my dog to behave in a new country.
i m an actress and i work at a grocery store.
i think i ll be famous one day.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I spend my weekends reading fantasy novels and watching Game of Thrones.
That sounds fun, what are your favorite novels?
I really enjoy the Wheel of Time series by Robert Jordan and the Lord of the Rings series by J.R.R. Tolkien.
I've never read either of those, but I've heard good things about them.
You should definitely check them out! They're both really long series, but they're both really good.
Maybe I will, thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you do for fun?
I like to explore the city with my best friend and I'm really interested in my family history.
That sounds like fun! Where do you live?
I live in a small town in the Midwest, but I love to visit big cities like Chicago and New York.
I've always wanted to visit Chicago! It's supposed to be a really cool city.
It is! I love the architecture and the food.
I've heard the food is great! What's your favorite thing to eat there?
I love the deep dish pizza! It's so delicious
